content: I'm trying to connect to http://argonaut.healthintersections.com.au/, but am timing out. This is shown as a testing server on http://argonautwiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=Main_Page, and I need the metadata for the argonaut api (/metadata?_format=application/json). Would anyone know how to get this information or another test server from which I can pull that json?
hmm I should remove that from the list. That server no longer exists
use one of the normal testing servers
